title: Corn and quinoa tamale, grilled vegetable salsa and marinated grilled chicken
description: Go all out for a Mexican barbecue with spiced cornmeal stuffed in corn husks with lime and honeyed chicken thighs.
ingredients: 4 sweetcorn on the cob with husks on
1 dried chipotle chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped or 1 tsp chipotle paste
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ handful of fresh mint, chopped
½ handful of fresh coriander, chopped
½ handful of fresh basil, chopped
